overview:
Kosta has a passion for creating, managing and growing companies from the ground up. Prior to founding Vionic, Kosta created several companies in the software technology and direct sales sectors. Most recently, Kosta co-founded a direct sales company in the energy drinks market that today operates in over 30 countries, with sales in excess of $100 million. Having authored several articles and books, Kosta is recognized as a Subject Matter Expert in the Direct Sales Industry, and he is a frequent presenter at conferences worldwide.

Kosta studied computer engineering at Carleton University. His career has progressed as a Regional Sales Director and General Manager with two Fortune 500 companies to managing hundreds of employees with millions of dollars in sales.

As CEO of Vionic, Kosta works closely with his talented, tech-savvy team to strategically position Vionic to become a premier company in the world of cloud technology, providing cutting-edge marketing solutions that will revolutionize the social media world.
